text: Polyoxymethylene dimethyl ethers (PODE or DMMn) are a class of chemical compounds with the molecular formula H3CO(CH2O)nCH3 where n is typically about 3 to 8. PODE can be produced from methylal and formaldehyde or a formaldehyde equivalent such as paraformaldehyde or trioxane. PODE is used as a diesel fuel additive and as a solvent. ==References== Category:Ethers Category:Acetals
title: Polyoxymethylene dimethyl ethers
